Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery meat-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of at least one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393522) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393522)
